item.title: About
item.description: Sean Westgate I am an entrepreneurial technologist with over 20 years experience driving innovation, building products, running teams and growing businesses. I am working as a Technical Consultant helping tech teams improve and deliver disruptive products. Please check out my LinkedIn profile for a full list of experiences, or keep on reading to find out more about me. As the driving founder of Green Hippo Ltd I had the privilege to work with some awesome people over the years.
